author: bentmann
msg: o Decoupled test from central and used a file-based stub repo

author: rgodfrey
msg: Don't failover if the client is closing the connection, check if connection is closed on send

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Akash Jain "NPE appears on create customer from order entry screens." (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3079) - OFBIZ-3079

There is a session issue, actually there is getting ShoppingCart object from session when session is expired then ShoppingCart object will be null and there is no check for this ShoppingCart object and call method of ShoppingCart.
